thread.section_title: Hotel Eiffel Seine - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A lovely little hotel in the heart of Paris
thread.title_full: A lovely little hotel in the heart of Paris - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Kachna13
title: A lovely little hotel in the heart of Paris
text:
Eiffel Seine is a little (although tall - a good few floors!), cosy hotel in the middle of buzzing Paris. Our room was small but nice and clean. I'm not sure if one can get a room with a view on the Eiffel Tower, still our had an interesting feature - we could see the reflection (the "mirror" was a glassy office buidling oposite the hotel) of the tower once it was lit in the evening :-) The staff was very nice and helpful and had a little furry "helper" hanging around in the lobby, a cat (welcomed by us, pets lovers), which in our view created a very home-like atmosphere.
The hotel is approximately 5-10 minutes walk from the tower, there are alsoa few metro and train stations in the vicinity, which makes travelling to other parts of Paris very easy.
